description: Bid submission for spares as outlined in RFP (Request for Proposal), to be delivered as laid out in the tender document. Proposal must offer the lowest price to win. Plans for procurement are to be submitted via email.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number: W8486-249387/A

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of spare parts.

### Tender Details

* **Contract Title:** Spare Parts
* **Tender Number:** W8486-249387/A
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-16
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-27, 14:00:00 (local time)
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** 2023-12-01 and 2024-02-29, respectively.
 
### Procurement Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Goods and Services

* **NCMS Classification Codes:** 25111900 (Marine craft systems and subassemblies), 25173300 (Master control systems), 40101700 (Cooling equipment and parts and accessories)
* **DSIC Category:** Goods (GD)

### Delivery and Pickup

The delivery is requested at:
- Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E., Montreal, QC H1N 1V9
- Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Ave & 82nd St., Bldg. 236, Edmonton, AB T5J 4J5
with no later than 2024-02-29.

### Attachments and Contact Information

*   **Tender Description:** The full RFP document, in French and English, can be downloaded at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/22141/w8486-249387---spares-buy---rfp\ Conway, Ontario, K1A 0K2. (000) 000-0000.
*   **Contact Person:** Alexander Reynolds, (000) 000-0000, alexander.reynolds@forces.gc.ca

### Other Relevant Information

*   This contract uses electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only. For details, refer to the solicitation document.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Trade agreements: please refer to the tender document.

Make sure you have removed the unimportant
